body: Shahzad Ahmed reports in a tweet that Pakistan's Interior Minister Rehman Malik has called for the "Nation" to report anti-Islam or blasphemous contents to him, so these can be blocked within 24 hours.
original_body: Shahzad Ahmed reports in a tweet that Pakistan's Interior Minister Rehman Malik has called for the "Nation" to report anti-Islam or blasphemous contents to him, so these can be blocked within 24 hours.
title: Pakistan: Interior Minister Calls For Reporting Of Blasphemous Contents

sentence: Shahzad Ahmed reports in a tweet that Pakistan's Interior Minister Rehman Malik has called for the "Nation" to report anti-Islam or blasphemous contents to him, so these can be blocked within 24 hours.
